timeline.bodyText: This might be considered as a breaking change as the application code need to be updated.
timeline.author: cescoffier

replies.bodyText:
Yes, it is described in the PR and I added the breaking change label.
The extension is still in preview so I think we can have this kind of small breaking change but if youre against it I'm OK.
In fact, it's not really a breaking change as the user can include the legacy driver that still contains this class.
replies.author: loicmathieu
